actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Senate Subcommittee on National Parks
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Senate Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 113-493.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate certain segments of East Rosebud Creek in Carbon County, Montana, as components of the Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
short_title: East Rosebud Wild and Scenic Rivers Act
subjects: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

summary.text:
East Rosebud Wild and Scenic Rivers Act - Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate specified river segments of the East Rosebud Creek in Montana as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

Prohibits the inclusion of any private property within the boundaries of those segments.

titles.title: East Rosebud Wild and Scenic Rivers Act
